svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-05-07T12:45:32.100Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/112.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="AH02vlG0wllVHQ-iZttK" version="21.2.9" type="google"><diagram name="Page-1" id="N_A5zDOFCtsPbhMCdhvu"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 291px; height: 1px; padding-top: 615px; margin-left: 874px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 393px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: View branches (* indicates the current branch)

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Create new branch and switch to the newly created branch

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 402px; height: 1px; padding-top: 380px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 580px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.span: Show commit history in one line

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: To tell what files git track and what doesn't i.e usually red and green:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: To view the list of changed files associated with commit id

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: To view the list of files tracked by git

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: To view file contents of specific commit id, this does not delete file contents. Just shows the commit id’s content. After execution of this command it enters detached HEAD state

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: After looking at the specific commit id’s file contents, to get back to the current development state, i.e. Go back from detached HEAD state

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 397px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 8px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 375px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Commit staged files with commit message

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Rewrite the last commit message, only rewrites the commit message

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 329px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 453px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 453px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.font: Unstage specific file without discarding changes

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Unstage all the staged files for commit

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Deletes the current commit id and associated contents, puts back file to selected commit id contents. Deleted contents are not recoverable.
Dump modified, uncommitted code and reset to last commit.
Assuming some mistake in the code was found after committing. Undo commit leaving file contents undisturbed so you can make changes and add a new commit

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 358px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 867px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 594px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.font: Save your incomplete code in a place, work on an emergency fix and retrieve it later. The place you store your incomplete work/code is stash

p.span: To save code to stash - for single & multiple stash

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Note: use ` backticks before @,{,} when using powershell
Popping stash removes code from stash and applies to the working file/directory

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Apply keeps the copy of code in stash and applies to the working file/directory

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 342px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 1247px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 335px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.font: Renaming a file from git, commit after execution

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: To delete a file from filesystem and git index(.git)

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: If files are manually deleted, we can tell git to track the changes:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: To tell git to pick ALL the newly created files and deleted or modified files:

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 380px; height: 1px; padding-top: 342px; margin-left: 1251px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Set Git login details from terminal:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; text-indent: 36pt;

p.span: To ignore files only in root(.git) directory, but not in sub directory

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: To ignore file located in init folder at root directory

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: To ignore all the files with specific name including sub directory, specify in root gitignore file

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline;

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
